message: Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you this great product! I think you'll really love it. I'm willing to sell it to you for $95.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $85. Would you be willing to meet me in the middle?
I appreciate your interest in the product, Bob. I can do a bit better than $85, but I need to make a profit. How about we meet at $90?
I'm still interested in the product, but I think we can do even better than that. How about $87.50? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
I appreciate your persistence, Bob. I can see you're serious about getting a good deal. I'm willing to meet you at $88, but I think I can do a bit better than that. How about $89?

I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. I'm still interested in the product, but I think we can do a bit better than $89. How about $88.50? I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I'm not willing to go any higher than that.
I'm starting to think we're getting close to a deal, Bob. I'm willing to meet you at $89, but I'm not willing to go any lower than that. How about we call it a day at $89?
